thread.title: Absolutely perfect for a quick stay
thread.title_full: Absolutely perfect for a quick stay - Review of Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: M23rdPWR
title: Absolutely perfect for a quick stay
text:
I have stayed here TWICE in the past week. First for an overnight on Sunday and then again for a two-night Thursday and Friday. Both experiences were top notch. Customer service is exemplary. Great little bar/restaurant on property. Front Desk and Bell Men were very attentive and accommodating. I will stay there again for sure.
Room Tip: Totally remodeled boutique style rooms - GREAT bathrooms! See more room tips
